NightViper smiled and thought of the possibilities. "NightViper... 
TERRORIZE!" His body shifted and morphed and soon a gigantic King 
Cobra rose smiling as it followed the femme. "It would be an honor to 
follow you..." He hissed a chuckle and kept pace as his large body 
slithered across the ground.
